original: 九江壽春人，東吳官員，蔣欽長子。蔣欽死後，蔣壹承其爵位兵權。夷陵之戰時領兵對抗劉備軍，有戰功，又被調還南郡。最後與魏交戰時陣亡。
text: Jiujiang Shouchun, official of Soochow, Jiang Qin's eldest son. After Jiang Qin's death, Jiang Yi assumed the military power of his title. During the battle of Yiling, he led his troops against Liu Beijun, who had military exploits, and was transferred back to Nanjun. At last he was killed in battle with Wei.
